title: 'Love & Mercy' Brings The Life Of Brian Wilson To The Big Screen
teaser: Screenwriter Oren Moverman talks with Fresh Air's Terry Gross about the film's depiction of the Beach Boy's troubled life. We'll also listen back to an interview Gross recorded with Wilson in 1988.
